original_text: I looked, and there before me was a pale horse! Its rider was named Death, and Hades was following close behind him. They were given power over a fourth of the earth to kill by sword, famine and plague, and by the wild beasts of the earth.
korean_text: 내가 보매 청황색 말이 나오는데 그 탄 자의 이름은 사망이니 음부가 그 뒤를 따르더라 그들이 땅 사분의 일의 권세를 얻어 검과 흉년과 사망과 땅의 짐승들로써 죽이더라

sentences.original_text: and there before me was a pale horse
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 창백한 말이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and Hades was following close behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 음부가 그의 바로 뒤를 따랐다

sentences.original_text: They were given power over a fourth of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 사분의 일을 다스리는 권세를 받았다

sentences.original_text: to kill by sword, famine and plague
and by the wild beasts of the earth
